quote: Recovery is not for people who need it, it’s for people who want it.
author: Anonymous

quote: Fall seven times, stand up eight.
author: Japanese Proverb

quote: The man who moves a mountain begins by carrying away small stones.
author: Confucius

quote: Courage is resistance to fear, mastery of fear – not absence of fear.
author: Mark Twain

quote: The journey of recovery is about progress, not perfection.
author: Anonymous

quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Out of suffering have emerged the strongest souls; the most massive characters are seared with scars.
author: Kahlil Gibran

quote: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Every strike brings me closer to the next home run.
author: Babe Ruth

quote: The pain you feel today will be the strength you feel tomorrow.
author: Anonymous

quote: Turn your wounds into wisdom.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
author: Henry Stanley Haskins

quote: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day-in and day-out.
author: Robert Collier

quote: The greater the difficulty, the more glory in surmounting it.
author: Epicurus

quote: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
author: Confucius

quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
author: Confucius

quote: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: I am not a product of my circumstances. I am a product of my decisions.
author: Stephen Covey

quote: You define your own life. Don't let other people write your script.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: The best way to predict your future is to create it.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: If you don't like the road you're walking, start paving another one.
author: Dolly Parton

quote: It’s not whether you get knocked down, it’s whether you get up.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: Success is not the absence of failure; it’s the persistence through failure.
author: Aisha Tyler

quote: The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible.
author: Charles Kingsleigh
